mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT se_date FROM seatandtime where mo_number = #{mo_number} order by se_date
SELECT DISTINCT se_time FROM seatandtime where mo_number = #{mo_number} order by se_time
SELECT * FROM seatandtime where mo_number = #{mo_number} and se_date = #{se_date} and se_time = #{se_time} order by se_number
